description: Returns a list of the DataSync tasks you created.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: You can use API filters to narrow down the list of resources returned by ListTasks. For example, to retrieve all tasks on a specific source location, you can use ListTasks with filter name LocationId and Operator Equals with the ARN for the location. (dict) --- You can use API filters to narrow down the list of resources returned by ListTasks. For example, to retrieve all tasks on a source location, you can use ListTasks with filter name LocationId and Operator Equals with the ARN for the location. For more information, see filtering DataSync resources. The name of the filter being used. Each API call supports a list of filters that are available for it. For example, LocationId for ListTasks. The values that you want to filter for. For example, you might want to display only tasks for a specific destination location. (string) --- The operator that is used to compare filter values (for example, Equals or Contains).

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter being used. Each API call supports a list of filters that are available for it. For example, LocationId for ListTasks.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The values that you want to filter for. For example, you might want to display only tasks for a specific destination location.

nested_params.name: Operator
nested_params.description: The operator that is used to compare filter values (for example, Equals or Contains).

nested_items.name: Tasks
nested_items.description: A list of all the tasks that are returned.

nested_items.name: TaskArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task.

nested_items.name: TaskMode
nested_items.description: The task mode that you're using. For more information, see Choosing a task mode for your data transfer.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An opaque string that indicates the position at which to begin returning the next list of tasks.
